subject: Re: [junit] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException error in ant junit target
msgSnippet: ... Is TestTemp.class under any of those paths? [Probably not] Bill de hÓra -- Sorry, I don t know the word sorry .- SHRDLU
messageBody:
> <path id="aweb.classpath">
> <pathelement location="${deploydir}/WEB-INF/classes"/>
> <fileset dir="${deploydir}/WEB-INF/lib">
> <include name="*.jar"/>
> </fileset>
> <fileset dir="${container.home}/common/lib">
> <include name="*.jar"/>
> </fileset>
> <fileset dir="${ant.home}/lib">
> <include name="junit.jar"/>
> <include name="optional.jar"/>
> </fileset>
> <!--This needs to be modified for dev purposes as they will have
> actuate home already set-->
> <fileset dir="../reports">
> <include name="*.jar"/>
> </fileset>
> </path>

Is TestTemp.class under any of those paths? [Probably not]

Bill de hÓra

--
Sorry, I don't know the word "sorry".- SHRDLU
